code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskInput(_ref){let{onAddTask}=_ref;const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAddTask(inputValue);setInputValue('');};const handleChange=e=>{setInputValue(e.target.value);};const handleKeyPress=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){handleSubmit(e);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"task-input",placeholder:"Add a new task...",value:inputValue,onChange:handleChange,onKeyPress:handleKeyPress}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"add-btn",children:"Add Task"})]});}export default TaskInput;
